name: Frisson DT
summary:
Frisson DT is a single-player, psychological horror game. You play a real-life paranormal investigator / live-streamer. You (and your colleagues) will visit various spooky locations to investigate reports of paranormal activity and figure out whether the reports are legitimate or a hoax. Once that's out of the way, you can identify the cause of the paranormal activity and help to remove it, all whilst trying to keep your viewers engaged and grow your online presence. Oh, and try not to die!

Research new technologies to help locate, identify, pacify and remove Paranormal entities.

Collect cards and grow your collection.

Lean new ways to protect yourself from the imminent danger that comes from meddling with the supernatural.

Buy new equipment to help improve the quality of your live streams and make them more engaging.

Upgrade your player HQ by adding new furniture, or upgrading existing stuff.

Soil yourself with the most intense horror experience

Witness paranormal events to make your stream more exciting for viewers

Grow your online presence to make more money and beat the competition.
